name: The Fool
description: A free spirit embracing new beginnings and spontaneity.
upright: Innocence, freedom, originality, adventure, travel, potential.
reversed: Recklessness, naivety, poor judgment, fear of unknown, holding back.

name: The Magician
description: Channeling personal power and skill to manifest goals.
upright: Willpower, resourcefulness, inspired action, concentration.
reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, unused talents, deception.

name: The High Priestess
description: A guardian of intuition, mystery, and hidden knowledge.
upright: Intuition, divine feminine, subconscious mind, secrecy.
reversed: Repressed intuition, hidden motives, lack of self-trust.

name: The Empress
description: Symbol of abundance, fertility, nurturing, and creativity.
upright: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, prosperity.
reversed: Dependence, creative block, domestic disharmony, stagnation.

name: The Emperor
description: Embodies authority, structure, leadership, and control.
upright: Authority, structure, establishment, practical leadership.
reversed: Domination, tyranny, rigidity, lack of discipline.

name: The Hierophant
description: Represents tradition, spiritual guidance, and conformity.
upright: Spiritual wisdom, tradition, conformity, morality, ethics.
reversed: Rebellion, personal beliefs, breaking conventions, hypocrisy.

name: The Lovers
description: Indicates love, union, choices, and harmonious partnerships.
upright: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices.
reversed: Imbalance, misalignment of values, disharmony, indecision.

name: The Chariot
description: Symbol of willpower, determination, and overcoming obstacles.
upright: Direction, control, success, ambition, victory.
reversed: Lack of control, aggression, self-doubt, scattered energy.

name: Strength
description: Inner courage, compassion, and gentle power to endure.
upright: Courage, persuasion, influence, inner strength, compassion.
reversed: Self-doubt, lack of energy, raw emotion, lack of courage.

name: The Hermit
description: Wisdom gained through introspection, solitude, and guidance.
upright: Soul-searching, reflection, inner guidance, introspection.
reversed: Isolation, withdrawal, loneliness, misdirection.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Fate, cycles, and the ups and downs of life.
upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, turning point.
reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, external forces, setbacks.

name: Justice
description: Fairness, truth, and balancing the scales of karma.
upright: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law.
reversed: Dishonesty, unfairness, lack of accountability, imbalance.

name: The Hanged Man
description: A shift in perspective through surrender and letting go.
upright: Sacrifice, release, martyrdom, new perspective, pause.
reversed: Stalling, needless sacrifice, fear of sacrifice, resistance.

name: Death
description: Transformation, endings that pave the way for new beginnings.
upright: Endings, transition, transformation, change, release.
reversed: Resistance to change, fear of new beginnings, stagnation.

name: Temperance
description: Moderation, balance, and harmonious integration.
upright: Balance, patience, purpose, moderation, harmony.
reversed: Imbalance, excess, conflict, lack of long-term vision.

name: The Devil
description: Temptation, bondage, and the shadow side of materialism.
upright: Addiction, materialism, playfulness, restriction, temptation.
reversed: Breaking free, detachment, overcoming addiction, independence.

name: The Tower
description: Sudden upheaval, revelation, and the breaking down of structures.
upright: Sudden change, chaos, awakening, revelation, breakdown.
reversed: Fear of change, denial, lingering chaos, delayed disaster.

name: The Star
description: Hope, renewal, and inspiration guiding you forward.
upright: Faith, hope, rejuvenation, positivity, spirituality.
reversed: Lack of faith, despair, discouragement, insecurity.

name: The Moon
description: Illusion, subconscious fears, and hidden truths emerging.
upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, intuition, the subconscious.
reversed: Release of fear, clarity, unveiling secrets, confusion lifts.

name: The Sun
description: Radiance, vitality, and positivity lighting your path.
upright: Success, positivity, warmth, vitality, happiness.
reversed: Lack of clarity, temporary depression, clouded outlook.

name: Judgement
description: Rebirth, inner calling, and a final reckoning of the past.
upright: Reflection, reckoning, awakening, self-evaluation, renewal.
reversed: Self-doubt, refusal to self-examine, missing the call.

name: The World
description: Completion, integration, and wholeness at the end of a journey.
upright: Fulfillment, achievement, unity, accomplishment, travel.
reversed: Lack of closure, incompletion, delays, short-term focus.

name: Ace of Wands
description: Burst of creative energy, passion, and new inspiration.
upright: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential, action.
reversed: Delays, lack of motivation, creative block, missed chances.

name: Two of Wands
description: Planning and making decisions for future expansion.
upright: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery, options.
reversed: Fear of change, playing safe, bad planning, stuck energy.

name: Three of Wands
description: Expansion, looking ahead, and waiting for results.
upright: Expansion, foresight, overseas opportunities, growth.
reversed: Delays, lack of foresight, unexpected obstacles, frustration.

name: Four of Wands
description: Celebration, homecoming, and community harmony.
upright: Stability, celebration, harmony, home, community.
reversed: Lack of support, personal celebration, conflict at home.

name: Five of Wands
description: Conflict and competition that demand courage and resolve.
upright: Conflict, competition, disagreements, tension, diversity.
reversed: Avoiding conflict, compromise, inner turmoil, suppressed anger.

name: Six of Wands
description: Victory, public recognition, and progress toward success.
upright: Success, recognition, self-confidence, achievement, victory.
reversed: Egotism, fall from grace, lack of recognition, doubt.

name: Seven of Wands
description: Standing your ground and defending your position.
upright: Challenge, competition, protection, perseverance, defense.
reversed: Giving up, overwhelmed, lack of confidence, exhaustion.

name: Eight of Wands
description: Swift movement, rapid progress, and quick decisions.
upright: Speed, action, swift change, movement, travel, alignment.
reversed: Delays, frustration, missed messages, stagnation, confusion.

name: Nine of Wands
description: Resilience and persistence in the face of challenges.
upright: Persistence, resilience, grit, close to success, stamina.
reversed: Exhaustion, defensiveness, paranoia, lack of resilience.

name: Ten of Wands
description: Carrying burdens and responsibilities that weigh heavily.
upright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion.
reversed: Burnout, stress, inability to delegate, overburdened.

name: Page of Wands
description: A messenger of new creative ideas and youthful enthusiasm.
upright: Enthusiasm, discovery, free spirit, exploration, new ideas.
reversed: Lack of direction, procrastination, conflict of ideas.

name: Knight of Wands
description: Impulsive and passionate energy driving action and adventure.
upright: Action, adventure, fearlessness, passion, confidence.
reversed: Recklessness, impatience, anger, scattered energy.

name: Queen of Wands
description: Warm, confident, and magnetic presence exuding creativity.
upright: Confidence, determination, independence, vibrancy, warmth.
reversed: Jealousy, controlling, temperamental, introversion.

name: King of Wands
description: Natural leader, visionary, and bold in pursuit of goals.
upright: Leadership, vision, boldness, entrepreneurship, honor.
reversed: Impulsiveness, arrogance, ruthlessness, haste.

name: Ace of Cups
description: A fresh start in matters of the heart and emotional renewal.
upright: Love, compassion, creativity, emotional fulfillment, intuition.
reversed: Blocked emotions, wasted opportunities, emotional loss.

name: Two of Cups
description: A strong connection, partnership, or union built on harmony.
upright: Unity, partnership, attraction, compatibility, connection.
reversed: Imbalance, broken communication, tension, misunderstandings.

name: Three of Cups
description: Celebration of friendship, community, and shared joy.
upright: Friendship, celebration, creativity, collaboration, community.
reversed: Excess, gossip, indulgence, isolation, feeling left out.

name: Four of Cups
description: Contemplation, perhaps leading to apathy or missed chances.
upright: Meditation, apathy, reevaluation, discontent, stagnation.
reversed: Sudden awareness, choosing happiness, acceptance, new interest.

name: Five of Cups
description: Loss, regret, and focusing on what has been spilled.
upright: Regret, disappointment, grief, emotional baggage, setback.
reversed: Acceptance, moving on, finding peace, forgiveness.

name: Six of Cups
description: Nostalgia, memories, and reconnecting with simpler times.
upright: Reunion, nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence, harmony.
reversed: Stuck in the past, naivety, lacking playfulness, boredom.

name: Seven of Cups
description: Overwhelming choices, fantasy, and illusions clouding judgment.
upright: Daydreaming, choices, illusions, wishful thinking, imagination.
reversed: Clarity, restored sense, making decisions, reality check.

name: Eight of Cups
description: Walking away from what no longer serves and seeking deeper meaning.
upright: Abandonment, withdrawal, seeking truth, walking away.
reversed: Fear of change, avoidance, stuck in disappointment, indecision.

name: Nine of Cups
description: Contentment and satisfaction often called the wish card.
upright: Wish fulfillment, satisfaction, contentment, happiness, comfort.
reversed: Greed, dissatisfaction, smugness, overindulgence.

name: Ten of Cups
description: Emotional fulfillment and harmony in relationships and family.
upright: Divine love, blissful relationships, harmony, alignment.
reversed: Disconnection, misalignment, struggling relationships, disharmony.

name: Page of Cups
description: A messenger of emotions, creativity, and heartfelt gestures.
upright: Imagination, youthfulness, emotional growth, curiosity, intuition.
reversed: Insecurity, emotional immaturity, lack of creativity, jealousy.

name: Knight of Cups
description: Romantic, idealistic energy seeking emotional connections.
upright: Romance, charm, imagination, following the heart, proposals.
reversed: Moodiness, jealousy, unrealistic expectations, insincerity.

name: Queen of Cups
description: Compassionate and intuitive caretaker of emotional well-being.
upright: Nurturing, compassion, intuition, sensitivity, calmness.
reversed: Emotional insecurity, codependency, blocked intuition, moodiness.

name: King of Cups
description: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, and diplomatic leader.
upright: Compassion, balance, emotional control, diplomacy, support.
reversed: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, volatility, insecurity.

name: Ace of Swords
description: New mental clarity and insight, a breakthrough of thought.
upright: Breakthrough, clarity, sharp mind, new ideas, truth.
reversed: Confusion, misinformation, chaos, missed ideas, blockage.

name: Two of Swords
description: A stalemate or difficult choice requiring balanced insight.
upright: Indecision, stalemate, truce, difficult choices, blocked emotions.
reversed: Lies exposed, lesser of two evils, confusion, indecisiveness.

name: Three of Swords
description: Heartbreak, pain, and sorrow often from conflict or betrayal.
upright: Heartbreak, sorrow, grief, rejection, pain.
reversed: Recovery, forgiveness, moving on, releasing pain.

name: Four of Swords
description: Rest and recuperation after conflict or illness, seeking peace.
upright: Rest, retreat, meditation, recovery, contemplation.
reversed: Exhaustion, burnout, stagnation, lack of self-care.

name: Five of Swords
description: Conflict and loss, often with tension and resentment left behind.
upright: Disagreement, betrayal, conflict, competition, victory at a cost.
reversed: Reconciliation, forgiveness, compromise, lingering resentment.

name: Six of Swords
description: Transition and moving on from difficulties towards calmer waters.
upright: Transition, recovery, moving on, leaving behind, relief.
reversed: Stuck in negativity, emotional baggage, resisting transition.

name: Seven of Swords
description: Deception or strategy, taking only what you need and leaving.
upright: Deceit, betrayal, cunning, strategy, getting away with it.
reversed: Exposure of deception, conscience, returning what was taken.

name: Eight of Swords
description: Feeling trapped or restricted by fears or limiting beliefs.
upright: Isolation, self-imposed restriction, fear, anxiety, helplessness.
reversed: Release, new perspective, finding solutions, escape.

name: Nine of Swords
description: Anxiety, worry, and sleepless nights from mental distress.
upright: Nightmares, anxiety, worry, despair, guilt, mental anguish.
reversed: Hope, reaching out, recovery, letting go of fear.

name: Ten of Swords
description: Painful endings and betrayal, but offering new perspectives.
upright: Betrayal, collapse, painful endings, rock bottom, crisis.
reversed: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end, healing.

name: Page of Swords
description: Curious, energetic mind seeking truth and knowledge.
upright: Curiosity, mental energy, communication, vigilance, ideas.
reversed: Deception, defensiveness, manipulation, all talk, gossip.

name: Knight of Swords
description: Swift and assertive action driven by intellectual ambition.
upright: Ambition, haste, action, directness, assertiveness, logic.
reversed: Rashness, impulsivity, scattered thought, unfocused action.

name: Queen of Swords
description: Independent and sharp-witted, with keen insight and fairness.
upright: Honesty, fairness, boundaries, clear thinking, perceptiveness.
reversed: Cold-heartedness, bitterness, cynicism, sharp tongue.

name: King of Swords
description: Authoritative intellect and rational judgment guide leadership.
upright: Mental clarity, authority, truth, discipline, moral integrity.
reversed: Manipulative, cruel, abusive power, irrationality, coldness.

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: A new opportunity in material or financial matters.
upright: Prosperity, new beginnings, abundance, manifestation, opportunity.
reversed: Lost opportunity, financial delay, lack of planning, scarcity.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: Balancing resources and priorities, adapting to changes.
upright: Balance, multitasking, adaptability, time management, flexibility.
reversed: Overcommitment, disorganization, financial instability.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: Collaboration and teamwork to build or create something lasting.
upright: Teamwork, collaboration, learning, building, initial fulfillment.
reversed: Lack of teamwork, disorganization, poor workmanship, conflict.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: Holding on tightly to possessions or control, sometimes too much.
upright: Conservation, security, frugality, stability, holding on.
reversed: Greed, materialism, self-protection, inability to let go.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: Hardship, financial loss, or feeling isolated without support.
upright: Poverty, insecurity, worry, isolation, financial hardship.
reversed: Recovery, positive change, new job, hope returning.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: Generosity, giving or receiving help, and balanced finances.
upright: Charity, generosity, sharing, prosperity, kindness.
reversed: Selfishness, debt, strings attached, inequality, abuse of power.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: Patience and waiting for the fruits of your labor to grow.
upright: Long-term view, perseverance, investment, sustainable results.
reversed: Lack of reward, impatience, poor planning, waste.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: Diligent work, skill mastery, and self-improvement.
upright: Apprenticeship, mastery, skill development, dedication, focus.
reversed: Lack of ambition, poor quality work, boredom, negligence.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: Comfort, luxury, and financial independence earned through effort.
upright: Financial independence, self-reliance, refinement, pleasure.
reversed: Overindulgence, superficiality, financial setbacks, dependence.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: Long-term financial security, legacy, and family stability.
upright: Wealth, inheritance, family ties, long-term success, tradition.
reversed: Financial failure, loneliness, loss, family disputes.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: A messenger of opportunity, practicality, and steady progress.
upright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, new skill, ambition.
reversed: Lack of progress, short-term focus, laziness, procrastination.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: Dedicated, methodical energy focused on security and growth.
upright: Hard work, productivity, routine, responsibility, reliability.
reversed: Laziness, boredom, stagnation, lack of progress, carelessness.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: Nurturing, practical, and resourceful with a grounded approach.
upright: Warmth, generosity, practicality, comfort, financial security.
reversed: Self-centeredness, work-home imbalance, smothering, neglect.

name: King of Pentacles
description: Wealth, stability, and discipline in achieving material success.
upright: Security, control, power, discipline, abundance, generosity.
reversed: Overindulgence, greed, stubbornness, financial imbalance.
